item.title: Marina Celar Ivankovic > Resume
item.description: dr. vet. med. Marina Čelar Ivanković - Resume Last updated: November 3rd, 2019. Contact information Email marina@ivankovic.me LinkedIn Instagram Work Volounteer work at the VEF clinics for internal medicine (2012. - 2014.) Volounteer work at the Khulula Wildlife Center, South Africa (2013.) Volounteer work at the county veterinary station in Varaždin (2005.) Teaching TA on the Internal Medicine classes (2013. - 2014.)
